text:
I have run into an issue with the CLI. We're building a theme in a portal and when I use `hs fetch my-theme my-theme` it all works great. However when I create a new file such as an image or font and then call `hs upload my-theme my-theme` I get an error. The error looks something like:
```failed due to a client error. Unable to create folder: Conflict CachingHttpResponse{statusCode=409, body={"status":"error","message":"A folder already exists at this path","errorType":"FOLDER_DUPLICATE","errorTokens"```
If I rather upload to a different folder that does not exist it works 100%.
I am using version 3.0.2
Any ideas?
